basics.name: Harry Solsem
basics.label: Leadership | ISO27001 | Team Leader | Project Manager | Digital Product Development | Change Management | Enterprise Architect
basics.summary: With over 30 years of leadership experience, including technical and administrative roles in companies such as DNB, Riverty, Neonomics, and Enebakk Municipality. I have Leadership experience: Led teams of up to 50 employees, Managed full responsibility for personnel, budget, and results, provided leadership across multiple organizations. Key areas of expertise: Team leadership, Product development, IT project management. Notable Companies: DNB, Riverty, Neonomics, Sharecat Solutions

education.institution: NHI, Norwegian School of Information Technology

projects.name: RELOVE V25
projects.description: RELOVE needs effective methods to document and showcase its societal value. This is crucial both to ensure continued support and to communicate the organization's significance in the local community. In the long term, RELOVE aims to qualify for a permanent position in the state budget. The pro bono team will therefore assist RELOVE in articulating their core business and identity in a clear and concise manner. The team will develop a few concise statements that capture the essence of RELOVE's operations, define the concrete value creation from RELOVE's various activity areas, and establish systematic measurement routines to document the organization's impact and results going forward, for example, through structured registration of recycled textile volumes or the number of young people entering employment.
highlights: Led a team of 5 people in a project to develop a new strategy for RELOVE.
Ensured the project was delivered within the timeframe and budget.
Developed a new communication strategy that increased RELOVE's visibility.

projects.name: OOF H24 - Finance and Business Management
projects.description: The purpose of this project is to assist OOF in selecting and implementing digital tools that will streamline and simplify administrative and operational processes. OOF aims to minimize manual tasks while strengthening its ability to maintain oversight and control within key functions such as time tracking, budget management, accounting, and project management.
highlights: Led the project to digitize administrative processes at Oslo og Omland Friluftsr√•d, focusing on time tracking, budgeting, and project management.
Conducted needs analysis and evaluation of digital tools that best met the organization's requirements.
Coordinated the implementation of new systems, resulting in a 30% reduction in manual administrative work.

projects.name: Sanitation of old Log tool and seployment of agents
projects.description: The project's mandate is to decommission old hardware, set up new hardware, and deploy various security-related agents on thousands of servers. My tasks in this project included continuous follow-up, stakeholder management, planning, reporting to portfolio management, reporting to the steering group, and handling project documentation. I coordinated resources, both internal and from our partners. Due to the country's situation, these tasks were largely carried out via Microsoft Teams.
highlights: Led the decommissioning of outdated hardware and implementation of new security solutions on thousands of servers.
Coordinated cross-functional teams in a fully digital work model during the pandemic via Microsoft Teams.
Regularly reported to the steering group and portfolio management, achieving 100% of the project's milestones.

projects.name: Implementing extended security focus in DNB software lifecycle
projects.description: The project's mandate is to identify needs, procure, implement, and establish governance documents for solutions that increase focus on security aspects throughout the software lifecycle for software developed internally and by our partners. My tasks in this project included continuous follow-up, stakeholder management, planning, reporting to portfolio management, reporting to the steering group, and handling project documentation. I coordinated resources, both internal and from our partners. Supplier dialogue included describing requirements, conducting supplier evaluations. Due to the country's situation, these tasks were largely carried out via Microsoft Teams.
highlights: Developed and implemented comprehensive security-focused governance documents for software development at DNB.
Conducted supplier evaluations and established new security requirements for external development partners.
Achieved significant improvement in security focus throughout the software lifecycle by implementing new tools and routines.

projects.name: IAM - cleanup and compliance
projects.description: The project's mandate is to implement extended automation of access management using ServiceNow, IIQ, and other relevant tools. My tasks in this project included continuous follow-up, stakeholder management, planning, reporting to portfolio management, reporting to the steering group, and handling project documentation. Due to the country's situation, these tasks were largely carried out via Microsoft Teams.
highlights: Led the implementation of automated access management with ServiceNow and IIQ, resulting in a 40% reduction in manual access processes.
Ensured compliance with internal and external regulations through improved documentation and processes.
Coordinated stakeholders across departments to ensure optimal implementation of the IAM solution.

projects.name: Penetration testing
projects.description: The project's mandate was to facilitate penetration testing of DNB's systems. My tasks in this project included continuous follow-up, stakeholder management, planning, reporting to portfolio management, reporting to the steering group, and handling project documentation. I coordinated resources, both internal and from our partners. Due to the country's situation, these tasks were largely carried out via Microsoft Teams.
highlights: Established and led a comprehensive program for penetration testing of critical systems at DNB.
Coordinated internal security experts and external partners to conduct thorough security tests.
Developed protocols for systematic follow-up of findings, resulting in an 85% reduction in critical vulnerabilities.

projects.name: Implementing DDOS protection for a defined part of DNB's system portfolio
projects.description: The project's mandate was to move parts of DNB's system portfolio behind enhanced DDOS protection. My tasks in this project included continuous follow-up, stakeholder management, planning, reporting to portfolio management, reporting to the steering group, and handling project documentation. I coordinated resources, both internal and from our partners. Due to the country's situation, these tasks were largely carried out via Microsoft Teams.
highlights: Led the implementation of enhanced DDOS protection for critical system components at DNB.
Developed a comprehensive migration strategy that minimized downtime during system transitions.
Coordinated technical resources across teams to ensure seamless integration with existing infrastructure.

projects.name: New business portal
projects.description: Scrum Master for this development project. Performed the tasks associated with the role according to the Scrum Guide. Additionally, introduced and trained participants in agile methodologies, both within the IT organization and among participants from other business areas.
highlights: Served as Scrum Master for a cross-functional team of 8 people developing DNB's new business portal.
Conducted thorough training in agile methodologies for both IT developers and business representatives.
Facilitated daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospectives, contributing to a 30% increase in development efficiency.

projects.name: GDPR at DNB Liv
projects.description: Compliance project with the mandate to ensure that DNB-Liv's systems meet GDPR requirements. In this project, I served as Scrum Master, performing tasks as described in the Scrum Guide.
highlights: Led the GDPR implementation project for DNB Liv, ensuring full compliance by the May 2018 deadline.
Coordinated a cross-functional team consisting of legal experts, IT specialists, and business analysts.
Implemented new systems and processes to manage data privacy rights and data deletion.

projects.name: Supplier catalogue
projects.description: The project's mandate was to adapt and implement Sharecat's family of catalog services to be used by one of the world's largest oil suppliers. I took over the project as project manager after it had been ongoing for a few months. My tasks included tying up all loose ends, creating a detailed project plan for the remaining deliverables, and daily follow-up. The project was carried out with multi-disciplinary resources and participants in several countries. Planning, execution, and follow-up were carried out using MS Project 2013.
highlights: Took over a complex international project and developed a detailed project plan that ensured successful delivery.
Led a geographically distributed team across multiple countries in implementing Sharecat's catalog services.
Managed the project's resources and schedule using MS Project 2013, delivering within the original budget.

projects.name: Expansion of vCRM
projects.description: The project's mandate was to expand and improve Ventelo's CRM system. Based on an analysis of incoming requests to the IT department, five critical areas were identified where the existing system lacked support for business needs. The task was to analyze these needs and implement solutions that addressed the defined business cases.
highlights: Led and developed extensions to Ventelo's CRM system based on a thorough analysis of IT support requests.
Identified and implemented solutions for 5 critical business areas that lacked system support.
Performed both project manager and developer roles, resulting in seamless implementation and a 25% reduction in IT support requests.

projects.name: IRIS - Report Distribution System
projects.description: A system developed for the distribution of reports, with functionality for managing users and report objects to be distributed. The solution includes setting up subscriptions, scheduling distribution times and frequencies, and seamless integration with Active Directory (AD) for efficient user management. The system is built with C#, ADO.Net, and MS SQL Server as the database solution.
highlights: Developed and implemented a complete report distribution system using C# and MS SQL Server.
Implemented advanced AD integration for automated user management.
Designed a flexible subscription solution that allowed users to schedule and receive reports based on individual needs.

projects.name: ULV - Tool delivery
projects.description: A system designed to manage the delivery and return of tools. The solution is developed in C# with MS SQL Server as the database and ADO.Net for data access. The system includes functionality for electronic signatures, generation of customized reports, and seamless integration with Active Directory (AD) for efficient user management.
highlights: Led the project from requirements specification to implementation and operation.
Developed a C# application with MS SQL Server as the database.
Implemented AD integration and electronic signature functionality.

projects.name: tiUM - Time Registration Umoe Mandal
projects.description: Led a comprehensive implementation of a modern time registration system for Umoe Mandal, where I was responsible for all project phases from requirements analysis to deployment. The project included preparing a detailed requirements specification, designing a tailored solution architecture, technical implementation, coordinating rollout, and thorough training of both end-users and technical personnel. Additionally, I developed extensive user and system documentation to ensure sustainable future operations. The system was developed in VB.Net with a Winforms interface and MS SQL Server as the database solution. The solution included advanced functionality such as seamless integration with the existing time-stamping system, automatic email notifications for timesheet approvals, structured data transfer to the payroll system, and intelligent auto-generation of timesheets based on predefined criteria. This resulted in significantly reduced administrative workload and improved data quality in the organization's time registration and payroll processing.
highlights: Led the project from requirements specification to implementation and operation.
Developed a VB.Net application with MS SQL Server as the database.
Implemented integration with the time-stamping system and email notifications.

references.name: Thor Milde
references.reference: Harry is engaged, outgoing, and knowledgeable. As a project manager in a fast-paced and complex organization, he skillfully navigated projects involving multiple suppliers, deliveries, and locations. Harry is engaged, outgoing, and knowledgeable. As a project manager in a fast-paced and complex organization, he skillfully navigated projects involving multiple suppliers, deliveries, and locations.

references.name: Tom Kenneth Fossheim
references.reference: Harry contributed well in our company by filling several roles, including senior developer, scrum master and project manager. He helped improve our processes and worked dilligently to ensure compliance with best practise methodologies. As project manager he contributed on one of our largest implementation projects to date. Harry was a loyal and talented employee who always strove to improve the way we work

references.name: Lars S√∏raas
references.reference: Harry is an experienced scrum master and agile practitioner. He is very professional, and efficiently keeps the team focused and on track. It is always a pleasure working with him, and he has my recommendations.

volunteer.position: Teamlead for vlolunteers that are providing digital homework help
volunteer.summary: As teamlead my role is to coordinate and support volunteers who provide digital homework help to children and young people. I ensure that volunteers have the necessary resources and training to effectively assist students with their academic challenges. I organize regular meetings to discuss best practices, share experiences, and address any challenges that may arise. Additionally, I act as a liaison between the volunteers and the organization, ensuring clear communication and alignment with the organization's goals. My goal is to create a positive and supportive environment where volunteers feel motivated and empowered to make a difference in the lives of the students they help.

I coordinate board meetings and annual meetings, prepare agendas, and follow up on decisions made. I also represent the club externally in meetings with the municipality, sports associations, and the Norwegian Table Tennis Federation. Good financial management is a central part of my role, where I am responsible for budgeting, reporting, and applying for financial support. I organize training sessions, recruit qualified coaches, and facilitate player development at all levels. Planning and executing club tournaments as well as coordinating participation in external tournaments also fall under my responsibilities. I actively work to recruit new members through marketing and various recruitment activities. Furthermore, I ensure the maintenance of equipment, tables, and training facilities. An important part of my leadership is creating a positive environment in the club through social activities and good communication among members.
highlights: Reelected for this position is an indication that the members are pleased with how I am performing my duties

volunteer.summary: As a board member of a housing association, I have several responsibilities that contribute to ensuring a well-functioning and harmonious living environment for all residents. I actively participate in board meetings where I help make important decisions regarding the operation, maintenance, and development of the association. I work on budgeting and financial management, and I follow up on accounts and reporting to ensure that the association's funds are used responsibly and effectively. Additionally, I am responsible for entering into agreements with suppliers and service providers to ensure that necessary tasks such as cleaning, maintenance, and repairs are carried out professionally. I also help draft and update the association's statutes and house rules, ensuring they are enforced fairly. I regularly communicate with residents, both by informing them about matters affecting the community and by listening to their input and concerns. Furthermore, I contribute to planning and conducting annual meetings, where I present the association's status, discuss future plans, and ensure that everyone has the opportunity to participate in decision-making processes.
highlights: Reelected for this position on several occations, is an indication that the members are pleased with how I am performing my duties

volunteer.summary: As a board member of the Norwegian Thyroid Association, I contribute to promoting the association's work for people with thyroid disorders. I participate in planning and conducting meetings, develop strategies, and ensure follow-up on decisions. I contribute to financial management, participate in budgeting, and follow up on financial reports. Additionally, I work on communication and information, helping to reach out to members and partners. Through my engagement, I contribute to an inclusive environment that promotes knowledge, support, and development for members.
highlights: Reelected for this position on several occations, is an indication that the members are pleased with how I am performing my duties

volunteer.summary: As a peer supporter in the Norwegian Thyroid Association, I offer support and guidance to individuals living with thyroid disorders. I share experiences, listen to others' challenges, and help create a safe space where members can exchange advice and find motivation. Through my engagement, I contribute to strengthening the community and promoting understanding of the condition.

work.name: Enebakk municipality
work.summary: As Digitalization Project Manager at Enebakk Municipality, I play a key role in driving forward digital initiatives that create real value for both citizens and employees. I lead projects that streamline services, enhance user experiences, and modernize internal processes ‚Äì with a strong focus on sustainability, benefit realization, and strategic alignment.I also serve as team lead for the municipality‚Äôs project portfolio team, where I coordinate ongoing projects, allocate resources, and ensure structured portfolio management across departments. This enables better collaboration, improved execution capacity, and more targeted development. In parallel, I‚Äôm building and will lead a new Project Management Office (PMO) for the organization. The PMO will provide common frameworks, tools, and support functions to ensure professional project execution. It will strengthen governance, support project managers, and give leadership the insight needed to make informed decisions. I combine strategic insight with hands-on delivery. With strong experience from complex public sector projects and a proven ability to foster cross-functional collaboration, I‚Äôm passionate about translating digital potential into real-world improvements ‚Äì and helping shape a modern, efficient, and attractive public sector.
highlights: Management of digitalization projects in Enebakk Municipality, focusing on streamlining and improving municipal services through digitalization.
Leader of the portfolio team coordinating and prioritizing digitalization initiatives to ensure alignment with the municipality's strategic goals.
Head of the PMO (Project Main Office), establishing and maintaining project management standards and procedures to ensure successful project delivery.

work.name: Prosperastiftelsen
work.summary: Hired as a project manager at Prosperastiftelsen. My responsibilities include leading project teams, planning, prioritizing, and decision-making, overall responsibility for the quality of deliverables, ensuring deadlines are met, and anchoring with the project recipient. In this role, I actively apply knowledge from my certifications in Prosci Change Management and Prince2 project methodology, combined with experience from Lean and Agile. I have built and led several teams of up to 5 people, focusing on creating team spirit and psychological safety. All projects have been delivered according to quality goals and within the set deadlines.
highlights: Being asked to manage several projects indicates that Prosperastiftelsen are happy with my performance as project manager

work.name: Riverty
work.summary: As a diversity leader for technical resources at Riverty, I have achieved significant results through strategic personnel management and organizational development. I developed a high-performing leadership team consisting of 5 team leaders who consistently achieved increased satisfaction in employee surveys. Through structured development conversations and individually tailored career plans for my 15 direct-reporting engineers and my leadership team, I reduced turnover by 20%, creating stability and continuity in the department. For the 50 employees I had overall responsibility for, I implemented monthly professional days and social events that measurably strengthened both team spirit and cross-disciplinary collaboration. On the recruitment side, I successfully attracted and hired 5 top talents with increasing retention. This was achieved through close and well-structured collaboration with People & Culture, where we jointly developed a recruitment program that reduced time-to-hire by 20% without compromising quality. For new hires, I created a structured onboarding program that reduced the time to full productivity from 4 to 2 months. One of my most important contributions was the standardization of development processes across all four Tech Hubs in Europe (Oslo, Stockholm, Tallinn, and Berlin). This harmonization resulted in a 30% increase in delivery capacity and enabled a common technical platform that accelerated time to market. Through systematic work to create a work environment characterized by psychological safety and a healthy error culture, I increased employee satisfaction compared to previously reported values. This also fostered innovation in the organization. My emphasis on physical presence in the office, combined with structured knowledge sharing through tools like Atlassian Confluence, has created a dynamic work environment where both individuals and teams can develop and deliver high-quality results.

work.name: The Norwegian Thyroid Association
work.summary: Consultant supporting the newly hired Secretary General with strategy clarifications, organizational development, recruitment, onboarding of new employees, and miscellaneous administrative tasks related to the operation of the association.

work.name: Neonomics
work.summary: As an Engineering Manager at Neonomics, I achieved significant results in personnel management and organizational development. I started as a Team Lead and advanced to Engineering Manager, where I ensured increased employee retention during a period of shifting product focus through targeted efforts. This stability provided a significant competitive advantage in a market characterized by high turnover among technical personnel. In my leadership role, I was responsible for a leadership group of 2 team leaders, where I implemented structured leadership development programs that improved their ability to effectively lead teams and follow up on personnel. This resulted in measurable improvements in team performance and delivery quality. In parallel, I had direct personnel responsibility for 11 engineers, where I increased both productivity and job satisfaction through regular one-on-one meetings and career plans. My present leadership created a work environment characterized by high psychological safety, which led to increased innovation and problem-solving ability within the team. Through strategic communication about the company's direction and future prospects, I built trusting relationships with employees, reducing uncertainty and strengthening engagement even during periods of change. By effectively using tools like Microsoft Office, Atlassian Jira, and Confluence, I optimized project management and knowledge sharing, resulting in more streamlined workflows and better cross-disciplinary collaboration. This contributed to both higher delivery quality and increased employee satisfaction, as documented through improved results in internal surveys.

work.name: KPMG Norway
work.summary: Consultant in project management and agile methodologies.

work.name: DNB
work.summary: My contributions here led to projects being delivered faster and with better end results for users, in addition to increased value for the funds invested in the projects. As a project manager in DNB's IT Security department, I was responsible for 5 projects and their daily management, reported to steering committees, and followed up on deliveries and finances. These include an IAM compliance project, implementation of DDOS protection for a selection of DNB's system portfolio, increased security focus within DNB's software lifecycle, and the decommissioning of an old shared logging solution. Tools used include Microsoft Project, ServiceNow, and Microsoft Office.

work.name: DNB
work.summary: I contributed to changing the work methodology from using waterfall in projects to adopting an agile approach with the help of Scrum. I was responsible for training colleagues in agile methodologies. This included both technical IT resources and colleagues from other parts of the organization.

work.name: Web Services Technology AS
work.summary: Responsible for the design, implementation, and maintenance of a CI/CD pipeline using TeamCity and OctoDeploy. The work included porting a Java application to C#, JavaScript, and XSL/XML to ensure compatibility and improved functionality. Provided training and guidance in the use of Microsoft development tools such as Visual Studio.

work.name: Sharecat Solutions AS
work.summary: Senior software developer with expertise in the Microsoft stack, Scrum Master, and Agile Coach responsible for implementing Scrum as a project execution methodology. Led delivery projects as a project manager using Prince2 methodology, focusing on structured planning, efficient resource management, and quality deliveries.

work.name: Ventelo
work.position: Technical Project Manager/Service Delivery Manager/Software Engineer
work.summary: Developed support and front-end systems. This included web applications used by Ventelo's customers to manage their customer relationships/subscriptions with Ventelo, as well as further development of Ventelo's internal CRM systems. Ventelo utilized SOA and developed using agile methods and continuous integration. C#, Asp.net, MS SQL, TDD, FakeItEasy.

work.name: Engineering Systems
work.summary: Developed new applications in C#, Windows SharePoint Services, and further developed/expanded existing applications.

work.name: Comunic AS
work.summary: Developed a WinForms project calculation system using C# and MS SQL Database.

work.name: Umoe Mandal AS
work.summary: Completed all phases of application development, including requirements specification, solution proposals, implementation, deployment, training, and operations. VB.Net, C#, MS SQL, Oracle. Developed middleware for data manipulation for data transfer/modification between Oracle SQL database and MS SQL database.

work.name: Intershare AS
work.summary: I was responsible for the further development of the company's software for rental management, ensuring it met evolving business needs. Additionally, I provided consulting services to the company's customers, delivering tailored solutions and support. My work involved using technologies such as MS Visual C++, MFC, Sybase SQL Anywhere, and MS SQL.

work.name: Edb Avdelingen S√∏r AS
work.summary: Consultant with assignments in user support, network operations (Microsoft and Novell), client configuration for Windows, setup of backup routines. Software development in ANSI C.

work.name: Manpower AS
work.summary: User support for Windows 95, operation of Token-Ring networks, setup, and operation of Windows clients.

work.name: PC-LAND SOFTWARE
work.summary: Developed software in Microsoft Visual Foxpro 3.0

work.name: Total Consept Development
work.summary: Main responsibility for developing administrative systems for restaurant industry and jukebox databases. Developed in Visual Basic

work.name: B√ÖDE OG RADIOREKLAMEBYR√Ö
work.summary: Main responsibility for development of ethernet network, client setup of Windows for Workgroups 11 and user support

work.name: NHI-Datah√∏gskolen
